Package org.cesecore.util.log

Class SaferDailyRollingFileAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      • org.apache.log4j.WriterAppender
        • org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
          • org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
            • org.cesecore.util.log.SaferDailyRollingFileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler
    public class SaferDailyRollingFileAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
    The purpose of this extension is to notify the client of the this log appender that it isn't possible to log anymore.
    Version:
    $Id: SaferDailyRollingFileAppender.java 18195 2013-11-25 08:51:43Z mikekushner $
